Class BasePage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hellosign.test.webtestsbase.BasePage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LandingPage, LoginPage

    public abstract class BasePage
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Sidelnikov Mikhail on 19.09.14. This is the main class for pages. When you create your page - you must extend your class from this
